radiographic_examinations.findings: Marked shortening and thickening with metaphyseal flaring of femur, tibia, fibula, humerus, ulna, and radius bilaterally, with tibia/fibula being more significantly involved than femur and marked attenuation of distal ulna.
Aortic valve anomaly with residual perimembranous ventricular septal defect and mild aortic dilatation.
Uterus and absence of bilateral ovaries.
